author: Krisztian Sandor, AI Boost
title: GameStop Raising Another $1.75B for Potential Bitcoin Purchases
description: The company made its initial acquisitions of bitcoin in May, buying 4,710 coins for about $500 million.
content:
GameStop (GME), the embattled video game retailer turned meme stock, announced Wednesday a $1.75 billion convertible senior note offering.
Proceeds will be used at least in part for "making investme… [+785 chars]
